title: VK Crvena zvezda
text:
VK Crvena zvezda (full name: Vaterpolo klub Crvena zvezda) is a professional <a href="water%20polo">water polo</a> club based in <a href="Belgrade">Belgrade</a>, <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>. It is part of the <a href="SD%20Crvena%20Zvezda">SD Crvena Zvezda</a> sports society. As of 2021–22 season, it competes in the <a href="Serbian%20Water%20Polo%20League%20A">Serbian League</a>, <a href="Regional%20Water%20Polo%20League">Regional League A1</a> and <a href="LEN%20Champions%20League">LEN Champions League</a>.
History.
VK Crvena zvezda won the <a href="2012%E2%80%9313%20LEN%20Champions%20League">2012–13 LEN Champions League</a> after beating <a href="VK%20Jug">Jug Dubrovnik</a> 8–7 in the final. That was the first time that VK Crvena zvezda triumphed in the <a href="LEN%20Champions%20League">LEN Champions League</a>. They finished the season in a brilliant way, after having won the <a href="Serbian%20Water%20Polo%20League%20A">Serbian League</a> and the <a href="Serbian%20Water%20Polo%20Cup">Serbian Cup</a>. In the 2013–14 season, VK Crvena zvezda won the <a href="LEN%20Super%20Cup">LEN Super Cup</a> and successfully defended domestic double.
In 2016, due to financial troubles, VK Crvena zvezda decided to play its home matches at Zrenjanin City Pool.
